...我们怎么昏迷了这么久...NPST事件才过去几小时.Translation: ...How could we have been unconscious for so long... The NPST incident was only a few hours ago.

总部士兵们，干得好，我以为要再也见不到你们了呢，接下来我复述本次行动目标....Translation: Headquarters: soldiers, good job, I thought I would never see you again. Now, I will reiterate the objectives of this mission...

等会？...他妈的，左边办公室里好像有什么动静....Translation: Wait? ... Damn it, it seems like there’s something moving in the left office...

报告，有不知名生物在攻击我们....Translation: Report: Unknown creatures are attacking us...

总部...鉴于目前情况，我部现将你们的行动代号更改为“GooseStep”，你们.Translation: Headquarters... In light of the current situation, we are changing your operation code to 'GooseStep'. Your mission remains unchanged...

总部收集一切在哈夫克设施内有关NPST协议的情报，然后活着带回总部...去其他有.Translation: Headquarters: collect all intelligence related to the NPST protocol within the Havoc facility, and return alive... Contact me again from another location with a radio.

总部祝武运昌隆.Translation: Headquarters: wishes you victory in your mission.
